hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select configuration from (select t2.configuration from dms_folder t1 inner join dms_folder_configuration t2 on t1.uuid = t2.folder_uuid where t1.uuid_path like '%${folderUuid?lower_case}%' order by t1.uuid_path asc) t where (t.configuration like '%DYFORM%' or t.configuration like '%MIXTURE%')
